alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 11 at 12:46AM CDT until April 11 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JASPER AND SOUTHWESTERN DADE COUNTIES... At 1245 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Golden City, or 15 miles northeast of Carthage, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carthage... Stockton Lake... Greenfield... Lockwood... Carytown... South Greenfield... Pennsboro... Dudenville... Meinert... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 44 and 51. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
